meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'snide', meaning derogatory or mocking in an indirect or sarcastic way.
meanings.sent1: She gave him the snidest look when he made a sarcastic comment.
meanings.sent2: The snidest remarks always came from the class bully.
meanings.sent3: Her snidest tone made everyone chuckle at the unexpected humor.
meanings.sent4: The snidest smile on her face revealed her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: His snidest jokes left a lasting impression on the audience.
